question: 検査する
sourceAnswer: To Examine, To Inspect, To Check
activeAnswer: To Examine, To Inspect, To Check
sourceMnemonic: You know that <ja>検査</ja> is inspection, so the verb version of that would be <vocabulary>to inspect</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. It will help to know <ja>検査</ja> already as well.
